headline: Best Dividend Aristocrats For June 2025

headline: U.S. Oil Giants Fight Over Guyana’s 11-Billion Barrel Treasure Trove
summary: This week, a private arbitration panel in London began hearing the arguments of U.S. supermajors ExxonMobil and Chevron regarding their rights to one of the world’s most lucrative oil projects.

headline: US Fund Managers Put on Notice by $65 Billion Dutch Investor
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Dutch pension fund PME is issuing a blanket warning to US money managers, amid concerns America’s investment industry is caving in to pressure from the Trump administration to abandon basic principles of stewardship.Most Read from BloombergUAE’s AI University Aims to Become Stanford of the GulfNY Wins Order Against US Funding Freeze in Congestion FightThey “aren’t condemning what Trump is doing and how he is operating and how he is handling issues like climate change and demolishi

headline: Historic Buying Opportunity: 5-7% Yields With Big Buybacks And Deep Discounts To NAV
summary: Being able to buy high-yield, high-buyback stocks with solid balance sheets at deep discounts to NAV is extremely rare. Check out two of my favorites now.
